mapper.select: select c.cNo, c.cProductQty, c.cProductTypePay, c.cCheckinTime, c.cCheckin, c.cCheckout, c.cPickupPos, c.cDropoffPos, c.cOrderCnt, c.mNo, c.pNo, p.pName from cart c inner join product p on c.pNo = p.pNo and c.mNo = #{mNo} order by p.pType, p.pNo, c.cCheckin, c.cCheckinTime

select c.cNo, c.cProductQty, c.cProductTypePay, c.cCheckinTime, c.cCheckin, c.cCheckout, c.cPickupPos, c.cDropoffPos, c.cOrderCnt, c.mNo, c.pNo, p.pPrice from cart c inner join product p on c.pNo = p.pNo and c.cNo = #{cNo}
select cNo, cProductQty from cart where mNo=#{mNo} and pNo=#{pNo} and cCheckin = TO_DATE(#{cCheckin}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
select cProductTypePay from cart where mNo=#{mNo} and pNo=#{pNo} and cCheckin = TO_DATE(#{cCheckin}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
mapper.insert: insert into cart (cNo, cProductQty, cProductTypePay, cCheckinTime, cCheckin, cCheckout, cPickupPos, cDropoffPos, cOrderCnt, mNo, pNo) values (cart_SEQ.nextval, #{cProductQty}, #{cProductTypePay}, #{cCheckinTime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCheckin}, #{cCheckout, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cPickupPos, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cDropoffPos, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cOrderCnt}, #{mNo}, #{pNo})
mapper.delete: delete from cart where mNo=#{mNo} and pNo=#{pNo} and cCheckin = TO_DATE(#{cCheckin}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
delete from cart where mNo=#{mNo} and cCheckin - SYSDATE < 0.000000000000000001
